page.title: 16Robert's family in Haddenham
page.content: Saturday 22nd June 1985. We woke at 7.30am and had breakfast. At 8.35 Daddy went to work. He is a doctor and is on call for emergencies. My Mum, 2 sisters and I went to do some shopping. When we came back I played with my friend Ian's electronic game called "Blockbuster". Then Ian went home and we had lunch which was fishfingers and chips and salad. After lunch my sisters went to our{village {carnival.}There is a{procession through the village and our school was {"St. Mary's Silly Circus"}The procession ended at the middle school where my sisters took part in a{ballet {display.}When they came back I went to Sam's birthday party. after the party I played "Scrabble" with my mum and dad and then I went to bed.
